## Cache.set() method

Adds a key-value pair to a cache.

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(key: K, value: V): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | K |  |
|  value | V |  |

**Returns:**

this

## Remarks

Avoid using this. Prefer using the `ifMissing` parameter of `get()` instead.
